column1: NGR is front of Abbey House because the sheets imply the house is to the East. The 1910 record suggests the gauge moved to the kitchen garden and maybe the garden is the continuous records but the continuous records here show a consistent house position and altitude to the front of thr house. There are briefly 2 overlapping gauges
